page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: Bath Sports And Leisure Centre. The centre is 10 years old and holds approximatly 30 sports. Which includes swimmming and a wide variety of dry sports. There are also facilities for lawn tennis and netball. The Assistant Manager told us that in Feb. 1985 12,800 people used the swimming pool and 14,000 used the dry sport facilities. The centre runs at a loss, the real cost for using the pool would be Â£3.50 per person but they only charge 35p. The council supports the centre financialy. There is a reduction for O.A.P.'s.The centre also provides bar and cafe facilities.
